rules.active: A visible NPC is forced to think positive thoughts.

details.flavour: "You see a distant obstacle, I see an upcoming opportunity" - Diggory the Myopic

rules.active: A visible character is forced to stop what they're doing and discuss their feelings with you.
rules.passive: Whenever you make an attack, you can choose whether or not it will deal damage.

details.flavour: "I guess, in a way, I've just been trying to impress my old man this whole time" - Brutus the Bloody Impaler

rules.active: For one minute, NPCs will not become hostile unless they take damage.

details.flavour: "There goes Swift Sammy, taking money out of our vault again. What a great guy." - Regis, Imminently-Unemployed Security Guard

rules.active: Name an NPC. They will dedicate their lives to promoting peace.

details.flavour: All life is precious, even the lives of your enemies

rules.active: Name a character who has wronged you. They feel remorse for what they have done.

details.flavour: "And that was the second time Randy forgot about my birthday" - Pete the Petty

rules.active: Disappear for as long as you remain perfectly still.
rules.passive: Deal double damage while out of combat.

details.flavour: Most battles are over before they've even begun

rules.active: Summon one of the following items: a knife, 5 feet of rope, a match, or a bottle of water.
rules.passive: Triple advantage on all d20 rolls when below 5 health.

details.flavour: The key to survival is flexibility and urgency
